attributes.review: Don’t download this app because a few minutes after I download it my phone was hacked, now I keep receiving sexual messages, 👁👄👁Now I had to go out and buy a new phone. So I am warning you don’t download it because they will hacked all your system and credit card information and you will go broke.🧍🏽‍♀️😔 This app is a scam.🤮
attributes.title: Worst app out there

attributes.review: Are you kidding me?! I showed up to one of his rallies and got corona virus! I thought he said that corona was a hoax and it isn’t real. I believed in you and I’ve been severely disappointed. This app also keeps glitching and shutting down whenever I get to the final pages I need to view. Delete this app it’s taking up valuable space in this App Store.
attributes.title: Worst app in the history of all apps ✨✊🏼🧚🏽

attributes.review: i downloaded this app with high hopes of it being the best of the best. but when i opened the app it was a terrible experience! i didn’t know how to sign up and the app kept glitching in and out. eventually i got it to work but guess what? the app magically somehow found out about my race and a pop up appeared saying “you have the chinese virus! you have the chinese virus!” worst app ever! can’t believe i ran into these complications. also, there was an ugly, old, orange looking man as if he was representing the app like what? he was so ugly and orange, i couldn’t stand it anymore so i ended up deleting the app. do not download this app!
attributes.title: horrifyingly terrible!!

attributes.review: in no way do i support trump. he’s an awful president PERIODT :) his app is even worse. mad my phone glitch and legit had to be shut off by apple because his people took over my phone. We were not happy abt this at ALL if we could we would sue. Long story short this app is awful, Donald trump is awful, and they should take the app and the president away :)). Have a nice day
attributes.title: Absolutely awful

attributes.review: I got in the app it was Glitchy, I just stoped working and it did that every time I opened the app and I think in order to fix this trash of an app is to delete it and never put it back on the App Store to the point where my phone said just delete this trash of an app so that’s what I did. So I think you should definitely 100% delete this app
attributes.title: Trash app

attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars I would. I got the app to keep track of the state of the country and the app glitched the moment I first try to open it. Not only that but it constantly freezes and closes down on my phone. This is a terribly built app. It is also very difficult to move around the app. I definitely do not recommend this trash app.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is absolutely the worst, most awful, horrible app ever. It completely made my cellular device malfunction and turn off. It wouldn’t even load up. It was so incredibly slow that it broke my phone! Worst app ever. Please take this app off of the App Store immediately! I would say that you should fix the glitches, but it’s so bad you should delete it entirely!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: So i logged on this app to pledge my support to a strong candidate in the 2020 elections. What I did not expect were inappropriate pictures of a rather large and unruly man who bears the same face as Donald Trump. If your struggling to picture this imagine a grotesquely large sheep, completely shaved of fur, with the head of the sphinx with an extra 10,000 years of erosion. would not recommend.
attributes.title: Not what I expected

attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app and started viewing the content, i was immediately banned from most of the apps on my phone. I got sued multiple tickets for some reason and when i tried to pay for them most of my money was STOLEN out of my account. I still can’t open a few of my apps like facebook and so on even after turning off my phone!! PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: FO NOT GET!!!

attributes.review:
I opened this app with sheer excitement as my trembling hands were eager to support the great orange one 🙈💖🥵But as I continued to use the app, my phone began to glitch and morph into crusty dusty musty racist fat Cheeto puff 😱😱Due to the malfunctions that exist within this app I  exist in a constant state of shock 👁👄👁If you want to avoid the emotional trauma that me and my dog experienced DONT get this app 🤬🤬🤬
ALL APPS MATTER NOT JUST THIS ONE!!!
d- d- d- Donald,,, how could you do this?! 😿😿😿🙀🙀
attributes.title: sis it’s a no from me 😔✊
